description.originalText: Jen baby sits for my one year old son, he adores her! She’s prompt, communicative and kind. She has no problem putting him down for bedtime which to me is a true feat! We were referred to Jen by dear friends so we knew she’s be a star and she is.

description.displayText: My daughter P. adores Jennifer! Always able to have good date nights with my wife knowing P. is having just as good of a time!
description.originalText: My daughter P. adores Jennifer! Always able to have good date nights with my wife knowing P. is having just as good of a time!

Jennifer has been our nanny and part of our family for over 2 years. My children love her so much. She is punctual and takes the children to all different fun activities including liberty science center, parks, libraries, Little Gym. She is reliable to pick our daughter up from school. We are so comfortable with her that we will go on trips and she will do overnights with the children. She is attentive and caring. Any family would be lucky to have her!!

description.displayText: Jenn is a gem, and we were lucky to have had her when we did. She's easy-going and kind but also a triple threat helping us with meal prep, house upkeep, and childcare. Jenn set a meal plan each week, shopped for the groceries, then prepared a variety of hot meals for our family of five- Hot dinners, sparkling kitchen, prepped lunches, every day.  Jenn did school pick up, afternoon activities, and homework. She also planned crafts, rescued me from last minute school project assignments, and organized field trips and outings. No housework task was too small - she just knocked them off the list. Jenn takes pride in the quality of her work, whether doing after school activities with our littlest one or ensuring that our teenage boys had the protein rich meals they craved. Communication was always seamless and easy, and she was always flexible with extended hours and weekend date nights. We moved out of state, but Jenn will remain part of our family, and we will miss her.

description.displayText: Jennifer is a responsible and reliable carer. She is patient, gentle and caring with young children. She organizes play dates, takes kids to the park and enjoys guiding kids with their craft and school projects. Jennifer also helps with chores at home. She was with our family for over 5 years.
description.originalText: Jennifer is a responsible and reliable carer. She is patient, gentle and caring with young children. She organizes play dates, takes kids to the park and enjoys guiding kids with their craft and school projects. Jennifer also helps with chores at home. She was with our family for over 5 years.

description.displayText: Jennifer is great with kids getting them ready for school Jennifer has stayed with my daughter while they were in virtual school throughout the year during the pandemic.
description.originalText: Jennifer is great with kids getting them ready for school Jennifer has stayed with my daughter while they were in virtual school throughout the year during the pandemic.

description.displayText:
Jennifer is an extremely patient, attentive and hardworking nanny. I am a nanny myself and She and I often planned play dates and weekly outings with our children. The age gap between our kids was close to 5 years, yet Jenn would make sure everyone played together and no child irrespective of age felt left out, confused, or bored. Whether it was a trip to the park, a lunch date or an entire day out Jenn made sure her boys always had everything they need: snacks based on food allergies and preferences, extra clothes, and always an emergency first aid kit handy. 
If her boys misbehaved she was firm about addressing the situation and helping them understand why they were wrong, more often though she was doting and very affectionate with them. 
In all, Jennifer is a great person to work with, she is straightforward, caring, and fun!

description.displayText: Jennifer has been amazing with my two children, 5 and 11. My kids have been with a few sitters over the years and they have mentioned several times how Jennifer has been the best. She goes above and beyond to keep my children entertained and busy. Jennifer is loving, attentive and reliable. She  has taught my children more respect and basic house rules that they were able to bring back home. I highly recommend her and her services and I am positive you will be satisfied as well.

I highly recommend her and her services and I am positive you will be satisfied as well.

description.displayText: My husband and I recently moved out of state due to his career in the military. We found Jennifer on another site for nannys. As a family that travels a lot from state to state i have hired many people for housekeeping dog walking and childcare. Jennifer was by far the most flexible punctual caring person we've ever hired. She has been present for a large chunk of my daughters life and my daughter is still very attached to her. She is an AMAZING cook. She introduced my family to many different cuisines. She is very neat and clean and dependable. After a while she became an important role in our family. Both my husband and my demanding career kept us very busy and there were times we fell short and she anticipated our needs. She facilitated play dates. She always had an activity planned for my daughter that not only was healthy but safe and educational. And I've observed her on our nanny cam numerous times and shes always conducted herself professionally. She is truly an asset to any fa

description.displayText: Jennifer is a great nanny. Immediately we could tell that she really loves to be around children.  Jennifer watched our twin girls from the ages of 5 months to 7 months.  She followed all of our directions and rules perfectly.  For anything we didn't explain, she asked questions.  One of our daughters is a little shy and Jennifer let her warm up first.  Jennifer was always on time and flexible with her schedule if we needed.  She did everything from taking care of basic needs (feeding, changing diapers) to helping the girls with skills like sitting up and crawling to reading books and taking the girls on walks. Jennifer also always provided a complete recap of the days event and let us know if anything out of the ordinary occurred (i.e. one baby didn't eat as much as usual).  We always knew our children were safe and in capable hands when we left for the day.  The only reason Jennifer is no longer with us full time, is that my wife has decided to stay home.  Jennifer would make a great full time nanny or occasional babysitter.
